Eligibility Criteria: People infected via contaminated blood or blood products
Required Documentation: Proof of infection (medical records); IBSS or NHS documentation; Identity proof

Eligibility Criteria: Family members affected by infected person
Required Documentation: Proof of relationship (marriage certificate, cohabitation evidence); Medical proof of infected person; Identity proof

Eligibility Criteria: Estates of deceased victims who were infected
Required Documentation: Death certificate; Proof of infection of deceased; Executor/administrator authorization; Identity proof

Eligibility Criteria: Individuals providing care to infected persons
Required Documentation: Care evidence (log of hours, medical confirmation of dependency); Identity proof
